rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0001
rows.name:
In the future, Chorrul wants to become
a merchant for a Nopon Guild.

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The Nopon Trade Guild is made up of
11 different guilds, but...

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0003
rows.name:
The biggest one right now is the
Avaritia Guild...

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Next is the Voltis Trade Guild... and the
weakest is the Pyrithium Trade Guild.

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0005
rows.name:
As for Chorrul... I think I'd like to
join the Avaritia Guild.

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0006
rows.name:
But first, it seems I have to make a coin
that serves as a proof of the guild.
